Adad-umaʾʾi Ber-nadin-šume Aššur-eriš Siku Adad-šuma-uṣur Bel-qarrad Buniya Šamaš-turi-lešir Šamaš-lešir Adad-šuma-uṣur Riš-Nabu Mar-Digla Abu-ṭab Aššur-kettu {m}x x x-am-ra-ni x-{d}iš₈-tar₂ x-{d}DUMU.MUNUS-a-nim x-DINGIR x-{d}AMAR.UTU x x x x x x-ia x-ke-tu x-ŠEŠ-SUM{+na} x-nu x-a-tu {m}x x x x napharu 31 bētāni ša x ša {iri}ba-na-x-x Mudammeq-Marduk Aššur-naṣir haziānu ušaddan u iddan Kuzallu ūmu 19-KAM₂ līmu Mudammeq-Marduk
